attributes.action: Ban the unfair practice of debt collection companies from ceasing goods from peoples homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i know we have debts and i know we should pay the money back!! but there are situations where circumstances can affect our ability to pay off loans.
